nfcTags.title: My NFC Tags
nfcTags.description: Manage your pet's NFC identification tags
nfcTags.empty.title: No NFC Tags Yet
nfcTags.empty.description: You haven't added any NFC tags yet.
nfcTags.qrDialog.title: Tag QR Code
nfcTags.qrDialog.description: Scan this QR code or share the link to access this tag
nfcTags.unlinkDialog.title: Unlink NFC Tag
nfcTags.unlinkDialog.description: Are you sure you want to unlink this NFC tag from {petName}? The tag will remain in your account but won't be associated with any pet.
nfcTags.deleteDialog.title: Delete NFC Tag
nfcTags.deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this NFC tag? This action cannot be undone.
